body: This dark, velvety cloak billows with a dramatic flourish in its wearer's wake. The cloak grants its wearer low-light vision. Once per day, on command, the wearer can surround herself with darkness, as the darkness spell. While this darkness is active, the cloak also grants the wearer darkvision 60 feet as well as low-light vision.
name: Cloak of the duskwalker
